headline: KKR Announces New Partners and Managing Directors
summary: NEW YORK, December 03, 2025--KKR today announced a newly promoted group of 8 Partners and 39 Managing Directors, effective January 1, 2026.

raw.headline: KKR Announces New Partners and Managing Directors
raw.summary: NEW YORK, December 03, 2025--KKR today announced a newly promoted group of 8 Partners and 39 Managing Directors, effective January 1, 2026.

headline: Capital Group and KKR to Advance Strategic Partnership, with Innovation Across Retirement Solutions and Model Portfolios
summary: Capital Group and KKR today announced an expansion of their strategic partnership to deliver new, integrated retirement and wealth solutions. The collaboration builds on their successful launch of public-private investment strategies in 2025.

raw.headline: Capital Group and KKR to Advance Strategic Partnership, with Innovation Across Retirement Solutions and Model Portfolios
raw.summary: Capital Group and KKR today announced an expansion of their strategic partnership to deliver new, integrated retirement and wealth solutions. The collaboration builds on their successful launch of public-private investment strategies in 2025.

headline: This Private-Credit Stock Has Gotten Hit Hard. Why It Still Might Join the S&P 500.
summary: Ares Management could be a buying opportunity for anyone willing to make a bet on potentially overstretched private credit.

raw.headline: This Private-Credit Stock Has Gotten Hit Hard. Why It Still Might Join the S&P 500.

headline: Is KKR’s 2025 Valuation Justified After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether KKR at around $122 a share is a bargain or a bubble, you are not alone. This article is here to unpack what that price really implies. The stock is up 1.5% over the last week and 3.7% over the past month, but still sits well below its highs with year-to-date (YTD) returns of -17.8% and a -21.9% slide over the last year, after posting gains of 156.0% and 222.6% over 3 and 5 years. Those moves have come as markets reassess alternative asset managers more broadly,...
